    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3393</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3393</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Llegir i escriure, quina aventura</string>
            <string language="en">Reading and writing, what an adventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert und Schreiben, ein welches Abenteuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture et écriture, quelle aventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura e escrita, que aventura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura e scrittura, ché avventura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάζοντας και γράφοντας, τι μια περιπέτεια</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Exposició del procés que segueix l'alumnat a l'hora de llegir i d'escriure textos.
Recull d'experiències i maneres d'orientar el treball de lectura i escriptura.</string>
            <string language="en">A description of the process infants follow as they learn to read and write. A collection of experiences and ways to direct children's reading and writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">constructivisme (psicologia)</string>
            <string language="en">constructivism (pedagogy)</string>
            <string language="es">constructivismo (psicología)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prelectura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-reading</string>
            <string language="es">prelectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">preescriptura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-writing</string>
            <string language="es">preescritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Beschreibung der Prozeßkinder folgen, wie 
sie erlernen zu lesen und zu schreiben. Eine Ansammlung 
Erfahrungen und Methoden, Messwert und Schreiben der Kinder zu 
verweisen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une description des enfants en bas âge de 
processus suivent comme ils apprennent à lire et écrire. Une 
collection d'expériences et de voies de diriger la lecture et 
l'écriture des enfants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma descrição dos infantes process segue como 
aprendem ler e escrever. Uma coleção das experiências e das 
maneiras dirigir a leitura e a escrita das crianças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una descrizione degli infanti trattati segue come
imparano leggere e scrivere. Una collezione di esperienze e di 
modi dirigere la lettura e scrittura dei bambini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιγραφή των νηπίων διαδικασίας ακολουθεί όπως 
μαθαίνουν να διαβάζουν και να γράφουν. Μια συλλογή της 
εμπειρίας και των τρόπων να κατευθυνθεί η ανάγνωση και το γράψιμο
των παιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">constructivism (pedagogy)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
